target_patch.description: The sound direction for this 90-second clip is a dynamic fusion of hip hop and classical music, creating a dramatic and futuristic atmosphere. The music is characterized by powerful orchestral strings intertwined with rhythmic hip hop beats, providing an intense backdrop that enhances the excitement of the futuristic ball sport. The sonic landscape is further enriched by electronic elements that add a modern edge, making the sound both distinctive and memorable. This unique blend of genres not only complements the visual intensity but also elevates the overall dramatic tone of the clip.
